channel.title: HELP Music Player. Need to know how to create a gui.class!
channel.description:
Yo guys, i need help making a music player from SCRATCH. So, can you tell me what needed to be made, and how it's made, and where it needs to be placed. Thanks guys!!!! Ive searched a TuT on forums for making new files, a new class file, helped a little bit but i still don't no where to start!! All i need is a gui interface, doesn't even have to have anything in-it! Then, from there i will be able to make a music tab
~Johno

item.title: HELP Music Player. Need to know how to create a gui.class!
item.dc:creator: @johno2 johno2
item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

[quote=“funkytown, post:2, topic:285338”]lol haii dog trying too make bs client eh?
umm i would suggest pming some1 who know this knowlegde turns too hillz forums[/quote]

Yo funky Yeh, ive asked if delta knows, i just need to know how to create a gui interface, then i will be able to add music.

Read full topic
